imdb.plot outline: Katti Batti is a Marathi romantic comedy television series starring Pushkar Sarad, Ashwini Kasar. In an unusual first meeting for an arranged marriage, Parag and Purva's parents have a major showdown and walk out on each other. However, this doesn't deter the young couple and they decide to meet again and eventually fall in love.
imdb.title: Katti Batti
plot: _Katti Batti_ (qv) is a Marathi romantic comedy television series starring Pushkar Sarad, Ashwini Kasar. In an unusual first meeting for an arranged marriage, Parag and Purva's parents have a major showdown and walk out on each other. However, this doesn't deter the young couple and they decide to meet again and eventually fall in love.
